items.sentence: The reason Tom got angry was that I didn\'t say anything.
Do you have any idea where Tom might have put his camera?
Do you think Tom would consider dating my younger sister?
Today I just feel like staying at home and doing nothing.
Tom accepted the job as janitor at the local high school.
Tom almost never forgets to wash his hands before eating.
Tom and I argued with each other about what we should do.
I wasn\'t the only one who knew what was going to happen.
I won\'t get the chance to do that again until next week.
I wonder if it\'s possible to teach myself perfect pitch.
You shouldn\'t allow your son to always have his own way.
A good sense of humor will help you deal with hard times.
Can you recommend a restaurant that has good Korean food?
Tom didn\'t think that his boss\'s plan was a viable one.
You must decide whether you will go by train or by plane.
Why don\'t we break off for a while and have some coffee?
I make it a point to visit Tom every time I\'m in Boston.
I never thought it\'d be this hard to create an iPad app.
I never would\'ve expected something like this to happen.
I think it\'s dangerous for children to play in the pond.
